title: Air parade: a Shell film for the Festival of Britain 1951
creator_credit: Shell Film Unit and Bill Mason
brief_description: A brief history of aviation in Britain commencing with Bleriot’s crossing of the Channel in 1909 and ending with the development of the gas-turbine airliner. This film traces the development of both military and civil aircraft including the Viscount turbo-jet and the Comet.
